title: Ruiners Property
description: Death ruins beauty, deception ruins loyalty, love ruins all…Sheltered most of her life from the true nature of the family business, Celestina Auditore agrees to move to Las Vegas to help run her father’s casino empire. She soon realizes that the business is built upon blood, bullets, and dirty money. When the Ruiners Motorcycle Club starts an all-out war with her family, her days as an innocent civilian are about to come to a brutal end...Jesse “Nitro” Cruz is the Ruiners MC’s deadliest enforcer, a ruthless hitman who carries out his kills with military precision. His next target will bring the entire Auditore crime family to their knees…the twenty-something princess won’t even know what hit her. An in-and-out job, or so he thinks.Celestina never thought she’d fall for a dangerous, murderous, tattooed biker.Jesse never thought he’d fall for a headstrong, sassy, mafia princess.…but neither of them thought Celestina’s own father could be behind her assassination…This is a STANDALONE Contemporary Romance Novel – No Cliff Hanger – Second book in the Ruiners Motorcycle Club series – Content suitable for adults only, contains violence, and graphic sexual content.
author: Abriella Blake
